div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxv die
octobris anno quo supra

The saide day It was statutit and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis
consal and communite that thai salbe iij portis opin dalie and sex personis
Ilkan day warnit that be sufficient mene with thar ger' ande
wapinnis as efferis and keip the saide portis and begyne at
a part of the tone and warne tham Circualie throw the halie
tone and nayne pas' to the kepin of the said portis exceptis sufficient
personis as thai will ansuer' to the tone and the kingis hienes
tharapone and that nayne tak na maner of Reuard' nor
wage fra nay persone vndir the pane of ane knyf
striking' throw thar handis and bannysing' of the tone

Item It was statut' and ordanit that nay maner of personis
Induellaris of this burghe pas' our' the wattir of Dee
withoutin leyf of the aldirman and the tone askit and obtenit
vndir the pane of tynsal of thar fredome and expelling'
of the tone And' that the officiaris warne al maner of mane
Induellaris this tone to the kepin of the portis and ourhip nane
conuenient tharto vndir the pane of tynsal of thar office and expelling'
of the tone for yer and day to the quhilkis thai ar' suorne the gret athe

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Dauid
menyes forspekar that alexander chamer hed' done nay wrang as yet
to margaret red' anent the clame of iij li' for ocht that thai hed'
sene

The saide day Robert ouchtirles oblist him be his hand' vphaldin
to bring the chartir of the Croft pertening to Alexander of chamer befor
the aldirman and balyeis one friday next to Cum
Curia ballivorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxix die Octobris anno quo supra

Johannes Wormet Jacobus Kintor Johannes litstar in grene Ricardus hill pater alexander
scrogis patricius leslie Ricardus litstar alexander prat Johannes tulibo Dauid spens Johannes
Duncansone henricus Orvm et thomas talyour Jurati dicunt quod quondam mariota
Club soror patris David Club latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad Pacem
et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis myll ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Willelmi loremar'
ex boreali partibus ab altera et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens Et quod dictus David
est legittimus et propinquior heres dicte quondam mariote sororis patris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est
legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum xx s' et valuit xiij s' et iiij d' tempore pacis
Et quod tenetur in capite de suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostri
regis per spacium xij annorum aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis
Datum et clausum et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
Octauo die mensis Nouembris anno quosupra

The saide day henry bawne was In amerciament of the court
be his avne tong gravnt for the wrangwis' dovne Casting
of the bolbrige and tile amend' as law will and forber in tyme
tocum

The saide it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Jonhne
of Cullane forspekar that Robert vchtirles' had done wrang
in the occupeing and manuring of the hous' liand in the castalgat
betuix the land' of vmquhile William malison' one the
west and the land' of vmquhile Jonhne gillespy one
the west Est ande the Chartir to Remane in ferme keping
in the handis of James Collisone bailyhe vnto this day
viij dais quhile it be sene be the Consaile quhai has
Richt tile It

The said' day the borghe strekit one alexander lindesay be gilbert
patirsone for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ij guthtlingis
and half ane guthtling was fundin of nayne availe be ane suorne
assis' Jonhne of Cullane forspekar for the quhilkis the said gilbert was
in ane Amerciament of the Court and the saide alexander was quyt
of his challance and clame

head.add: frater Johannes Wode et Robertus murray

div.p:
Eodem die Willelmus murray deuenit plegius legalis per manus
dextere ostensionem quod frater Johannes Wode et alij fratres domus fratrum predicatorum de abirdene
erunt Indempnes pro Roberto murray aliter quam per viam Juris Et Willelmus
portar deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere ostensionem quod dictus Robertus
erit Indempnes pro predictis fratre Johanne et aliis fratribus dicte domus aliter
quam per viam Juris Et quilibet dictarum obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indemp
nes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto die mensis
nouembris anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo ixo

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem Willelmi Durvard'
div.p:
Thomas Waus Dauid mar' Richardus hil senior Donaldus strachin
Andreas lousone Johannes Duncansone alexander prat Richardus litstar'
Willelmus Coupar Dauid tulidef et Walterus gareauche Jurati dicunt
quod quondam Johannes Durvard frater Willelmi Durvard latoris presencium obiit
vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis
de quadam terra Interiore Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico Inferiori ecclesie
ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Nicholaij mason' ex occidentali
et portam Communionem ex orientali Et de alia terra Jacente in vico viridi
inter terram Johannis litstar ex orientali et terram fratrum Carmelitarum
ex occidentali Et quod dictus Willelmus est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam Johannis fratris
suj de dictis terris cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicte terre cum pertinenciis
valent nunc per annum xxvj s' et viii d' et valuerunt xx s' tempore pacis
Et quod tenentur in Capite de Supprimo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et
nunc existunt in manibus domini nostri Regis per dimidium annj aut eocirca in defectu
veri heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis datum et clausum et cetera

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij die Nouembris
Anno quo Supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis with avys' of the Counsale
present for the tyme ordanit James Colisone to deliuer to margaret
Rede the relict of vmquhile Johne of gilespy the chartir that was
put in his hand' quhile It war' seyne quhome to It pertenit quhilkis
Robert Ouchtirles held' obefor' becaus' thai coud' fynd nayne vthir air'
nor' ayris entirit vmquhill Robert gilespy except Johne of gilespy
quhilk was entirit ayr' be the kingis breuis

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis with avys' of the Court
assignit friday that next cumis to Johne Duncansone to bring
William Durvard' befor thame with sic preuis as he will vys'
to preyve him out of tutory eftir the tenor' of the kingis lettres
makand' Intimacion that quethir he Comper or nocht he will minster
Justice eftir the tenor' of the said lettres
